title: Michiru Heya
description: Reno has a new roommate: his name is Roje, and there seems to be a lot of nasty rumours about him in this boys' school. They call him "Casanova" – he sells his body to almost anyone willing to pay for it. Reno is surprised to find that, for Roje, this is only business. The transaction is over when people get the wrong idea about something that's just sex. Reno just wonders how such a nice person can be so cold at times – and why is it that he can do those things as if it means nothing?

matches.title: Shingeki no Kyojin - The Lost Prince (Doujinshi)
Haikyuu!! - Shisseishou Oikawa Tooru no Hanashi (Doujinshi)
